messages.zh: 第四关（前）
messages.tl: Fourth level (front)

messages.zh: 不太对劲。
messages.tl: Not quite right.

messages.zh: 怎么？
messages.tl: how?

messages.zh: 凯尔希医生当时提醒过我......切尔诺伯格目前所处地区即将发生天灾。
messages.tl: Dr. Kal'tsit reminded me at the time... Chernobyl is currently experiencing a natural disaster in his area.

messages.zh: 加上有关整合运动兴起的一些情报，我们才会决定在这个时候冒险救出{@nickname}博士......
messages.tl: Together with some information about the rise of the Reunion Movement, we will decide to take the risk of saving Dr. PLAYER at this time...

messages.zh: 唔。
messages.tl: Well.

messages.zh: 可是整合运动——
messages.tl: But the Reunion Movement -

messages.zh: 一点想要转移切城的迹象都没有。
messages.tl: There are no signs of wanting to transfer the city.

messages.zh: 如果明知天灾要到来，那么最早在一个月前就能批次移动分城。
messages.tl: If you know that the natural disaster is coming, you can move the city in batches as early as one month.

messages.zh: 疑惑？
messages.tl: doubt?

messages.zh: 啊......博士可能还不清楚......
messages.tl: Ah... the doctor may not know yet...

messages.zh: 切尔诺伯格这样大型的城市，为了应对时常发生的天灾，是可以进行转移的。
messages.tl: A large city like Chernberg can be transferred in response to the frequent natural disasters.

messages.zh: 然而，整合运动却不管不顾......
messages.tl: However, the Reunion Movement does not care...

messages.zh: 仅仅是在街上重复着杀戮和战斗，让整个城市陷入战火......
messages.tl: It’s just repeating killings and battles on the street, putting the whole city into war...

messages.zh: 天灾降临时，就连坚固的切城都会被撕得粉碎......
messages.tl: When the natural disaster strikes, even the solid city will be torn apart...

messages.zh: 变成布满源石的巨型废墟！
messages.tl: Become a giant ruin full of source stones!

messages.zh: 整合运动究竟在谋划些什么？
messages.tl: What is the Reunion Movement planning?

messages.zh: 他们的指挥系统难道崩溃了吗......？
messages.tl: Has their command system collapsed...?

messages.zh: 不可能。
messages.tl: impossible.

messages.zh: 如果整合运动有指挥官，他就不会纵容手下四处散漫作乱——
messages.tl: If the Reunion Movement has a commander, he will not condone his men and women.

messages.zh: 更不会把部队白白葬送在天灾中。
messages.tl: It will not bury the troops in the natural disasters.

messages.zh: 但如果没有指挥官，整合运动根本不可能如此高效地瘫痪切城。
messages.tl: But without a commander, the Reunion Movement could not cut the city so efficiently.

messages.zh: 尤其是在这时候......
messages.tl: Especially at this time...

messages.zh: 在这所有人都会死的时候。除非......
messages.tl: When all of them will die. unless......

messages.zh: 除非什么？
messages.tl: Unless anything?

messages.zh: 我以前经历的战争中......
messages.tl: In the war I have experienced before...

messages.zh: 也有行为与整合运动的掌控者如出一辙的领袖。
messages.tl: There are also leaders who behave like the leaders of the Reunion Movement.

messages.zh: 于他而言，士兵不过是棋子，达到目的后就可以随意丢弃。
messages.tl: For him, the soldiers are just pieces, and they can be discarded at will when they reach their goal.

messages.zh: 既合理高效的运用兵力，又在不需要的时候放纵其自生自灭......
messages.tl: Use the force reasonably and efficiently, and indulge its self-destruction when it is not needed...

messages.zh: 因为训练与管理的成本太高了。
messages.tl: Because the cost of training and management is too high.

messages.zh: 只需在必要时，轻轻的推一下——追随者就会振臂高呼。
messages.tl: Just push it when necessary - followers will scream.

messages.zh: 如果真如整合运动宣传的那般，那它们的棋子，感染者，便源源不断——
messages.tl: If it is as advertised by the Reunion Movement, then their pieces, Infected Person, are constantly flowing –

messages.zh: 这种领袖并不是指挥官。
messages.tl: This leader is not a commander.

messages.zh: 他们是暴君。
messages.tl: They are tyrants.

messages.zh: 那边的整合运动小队转向我们了。
messages.tl: The Reunion Movement team over there turned to us.

messages.zh: 我们的踪迹被发现了？
messages.tl: Our trail has been discovered?

messages.zh: 可能还没有。
messages.tl: Maybe not yet.

messages.zh: 但也得早点结束他们愚蠢的闹剧......
messages.tl: But I have to end their stupid farce soon...
